required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness of a Online Training Program With a Clinical Procedure Standardized in Units of Nursing (CPSUN)
clinical_study.official_title: Effectiveness of a Online Training Program With a Clinical Procedure Standardized: "Blood Culture in Units of Nursing". Quasi-experimental Study

brief_summary.textblock: This study evaluates if the implementation of an online platform with procedures and protocols, improve the knowledge of professionals and can have a health impact related to decreased contamination of blood cultures.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a Quasi-experimental study, with parallel groups (experimental and control).
The aim of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of an Online Learning Platform used by nurses to improve the results of a blood culture technique. The online learning tool is studied in two of four internal medicine units of a tertiary hospital in Madrid. These two units have similar characteristics of personnel, materials and structure. Both units are at a great distance, preventing a professional talk to each other.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Contaminated Cultures in the Control and Experimental Group Before Intervention and After the Learning Obtained With the Online Training Platform.
primary_outcome.description: The results obtained in each arm of the study are collected month by month in both groups (Experimental and control). The data for each month are summarized for 6 months, reporting the pre-intervention result (for both groups: experimental and control). The data collected during the 3 months following the intervention are also summed during the 3 months, giving a value at the end of this time (month 9 of the study).

secondary_outcome.measure: Score on the Knowledge Test Related to Blood Culture Extraction Technique for Nurses (K-Blood-CT)
secondary_outcome.description: The improvement in the learning of the technique is measured with a test with 20 questions created ad hoc related of blood culture intervention (Blood culture collection knowledge test for nurses). The score ranges from 0 points (worst level of knowledge) to 10 points (best level of knowledge). The results can be divided into intervals: 0-2.99 very deficient; 3- 4.99 insufficient; 5-6.9 good; 7-8.9 notable; > 9 outstanding.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Online training of a nursing technique
arm_group.description: Participants receives an individual online training of extraction of blood culture for 3 months (This platform aims to improve knowledge and skills), they are sent 3 homework (one per month) and are evaluated at the end of each.
Participants don´t receives an individual online training of extraction of blood culture.Do their work as usual.

intervention.intervention_name: Online training of a nursing technique
intervention.description: The professionals with participant in the experimental arm receive an online training of a technique of extraction of blood culture and other arm the professionals no receive any training. They work as usual.
intervention.arm_group_label: Online training of a nursing technique

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Be nurse of the nursing unit selected.
- Foreseeing to remain in service during the study.
- Acceptance of voluntary participation in the study, prior information.
- Signature of informed consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Those professionals who for reasons beyond their control are transferred to other services or are on leave (in any form). They can not complete the various phases of the study.
- Professionals who, for whatever reason, decide to withdraw their consent to participate in the study.

facility.name: Hospital Universitario 12 de Octubre de Madrid

group.title: Online Training of a Nursing Technique
group.description: Participants receives an individual online training of extraction of blood culture for 3 months (This platform aims to improve knowledge and skills), they are sent 3 homework (one per month) and are evaluated at the end of each. Online training of a nursing technique: The professionals with participant in the experimental arm receive an online training of a technique of extraction of blood culture and other arm the professionals no receive any training. They work as usual.

group.title: Not Receive Online Training
group.description: Participants don´t receives an individual online training of extraction of blood culture. Do their work as usual.

baseline.population: Nurses working in internal medicine of the "Hospital 12 de Octubre Madrid"

group.title: Online Training of a Nursing Technique
group.description: Participants receives an individual online training of extraction of blood culture for 3 months (This platform aims to improve knowledge and skills), they are sent 3 homework (one per month) and are evaluated at the end of each. Online training of a nursing technique: The professionals with participant in the experimental arm receive an online training of a technique of extraction of blood culture and other arm the professionals no receive any training. They work as usual.

group.title: Not Receive Online Training
group.description: Participants don´t receives an individual online training of extraction of blood culture.Do their work as usual.

outcome.title: Number of Contaminated Cultures in the Control and Experimental Group Before Intervention and After the Learning Obtained With the Online Training Platform.
outcome.description: The results obtained in each arm of the study are collected month by month in both groups (Experimental and control). The data for each month are summarized for 6 months, reporting the pre-intervention result (for both groups: experimental and control). The data collected during the 3 months following the intervention are also summed during the 3 months, giving a value at the end of this time (month 9 of the study).
outcome.population: Number of Blood culture extracted. Any blood culture is likely to be contaminated by an inadequate technique.

group.title: Online Training of a Nursing Technique Before Intervention.
group.description: Participants perform the technique of blood culture extraction in a conventional way. After 6 months of monitoring of contaminated blood cultures, this group will receive online training to improve the performance of this technique. Report of month 6 (amount of the first 6 months).

group.title: Not Received Online Training Before Intervention.
group.description: Participants perform the technique of blood culture extraction in a conventional way. This group will not receives an individual online training of extraction of blood culture in any time during the study. Perform the technique as usual way. Report of month 6 (amount of the first 6 months).

group.title: Online Training of a Nursing Technique After Intervention.
group.description: Participants receives an individual online training of extraction of blood culture for 3 months (This platform aims to improve knowledge and skills), they are sent 3 homework (one per month) and are evaluated at the end of each. Online training of a nursing technique: The professionals with participant in the experimental arm receive an online training of a technique of extraction of blood culture and other arm ("Not receive online training after intervention") They will not receive any training. They work as usual. Report of month 9 (amount between the 6 to 9 months).

group.title: Not Received Online Training After Intervention.
group.description: Participants don´t receives an individual online training of extraction of blood culture.Do their work as usual. Report of month 9 (amount between the 6 to 9 months).

measure.title: Number of Contaminated Cultures in the Control and Experimental Group Before Intervention and After the Learning Obtained With the Online Training Platform.
measure.description: The results obtained in each arm of the study are collected month by month in both groups (Experimental and control). The data for each month are summarized for 6 months, reporting the pre-intervention result (for both groups: experimental and control). The data collected during the 3 months following the intervention are also summed during the 3 months, giving a value at the end of this time (month 9 of the study).
measure.population: Number of Blood culture extracted. Any blood culture is likely to be contaminated by an inadequate technique.

outcome.title: Score on the Knowledge Test Related to Blood Culture Extraction Technique for Nurses (K-Blood-CT)
outcome.description: The improvement in the learning of the technique is measured with a test with 20 questions created ad hoc related of blood culture intervention (Blood culture collection knowledge test for nurses). The score ranges from 0 points (worst level of knowledge) to 10 points (best level of knowledge). The results can be divided into intervals: 0-2.99 very deficient; 3- 4.99 insufficient; 5-6.9 good; 7-8.9 notable; > 9 outstanding.
outcome.population: Nurses who Work in the Internal Medicine Service of university hospital 12 de Octubre Madrid.

group.title: Online Training of a Nursing Technique Before Intervention.
group.description: Participants don´t receives any added knowledge or training in the 6 month before intervention. Maintain a regular training within their professional recycling. Those professionals were avaluated before starting the intervention for to know the previous level of Knowledge.

group.title: Not Received Online Training Before Intervention.
group.description: Participants don´t receives an individual online training of extraction of blood culture.Do their work as usual. Maintain a regular training within their professional recycling. Those professionals were avaluated before starting the intervention for to know the previous level of Knowledge.

group.title: Online Training of a Nursing Technique After Intervention.
group.description: Participants receives an individual online training of extraction of blood culture for 3 months (This platform aims to improve knowledge and skills), they are sent 3 homework (one per month) and are evaluated at the end of each. Online training of a nursing technique: The professionals with participant in the experimental arm receive an online training of a technique of extraction of blood culture and other arm the professionals no receive any training. They work as usual. Those professionals were evaluated after finished the intervention for to know the level of Knowledge.

group.title: Not Received Online Training After Intervention.
group.description: Participants don´t receives an individual online training of extraction of blood culture.Do their work as usual.Maintain a regular training within their professional recycling. Those professionals were evaluated after finished the intervention for to know the level of Knowledge.

measure.title: Score on the Knowledge Test Related to Blood Culture Extraction Technique for Nurses (K-Blood-CT)
measure.description: The improvement in the learning of the technique is measured with a test with 20 questions created ad hoc related of blood culture intervention (Blood culture collection knowledge test for nurses). The score ranges from 0 points (worst level of knowledge) to 10 points (best level of knowledge). The results can be divided into intervals: 0-2.99 very deficient; 3- 4.99 insufficient; 5-6.9 good; 7-8.9 notable; > 9 outstanding.
measure.population: Nurses who Work in the Internal Medicine Service of university hospital 12 de Octubre Madrid.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: All Principal Investigators ARE employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
